litespeedcache_desc: LiteSpeedCache is a hign pefermance cache solution for MediaWiki sites running on LiteSpeed Web Server.
litespeedcache_comment: Enable LiteSpeed LSCache Feature for MediaWiki
litespeedcache_login_user_cachable: LiteSpeed private Cache Enabled (for login users) :
litespeedcache_beta: This fearture is in early testing period, please disable it and feed back once any problem be found.
log-description-litespeedcache: These events track when LiteSpeed Cache action happens.
